clinical_study.brief_title: Bovine Pericardial Patch and TiLOOP® Bra Mesh in Immediate Implant Breast Reconstruction.
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized and Controlled Study of Efficacy and Safety of Bovine Pericardial Patch and TiLOOP® Bra Mesh in Patients With Immediate Implant Breast Reconstruction.

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This study is the first randomized and controlled study assessing the efficacy and safety of bovine pericardial patch and TiLOOP® bra mesh in patients with immediate implant breast reconstruction

primary_outcome.description: The rate of complications in the two groups

secondary_outcome.description: We use the Breast-Q questionnaire to evaluate patients' satisfaction via the reconstruction module of BREAST-Q.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately, up to 3 months, 6 months and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Harris evaluation score was used to evaluate the aesthetic outcome of patients' reconstructed breasts, which was scored as "excellent," "good," "fair," "poor".

secondary_outcome.measure: The rate of surgical revision of reconstructed breasts
secondary_outcome.description: To record the rate of surgical revision events of the reconstructed breasts

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 12 months after surgery, including the cost of surgical revision
secondary_outcome.description: Hospital inpatient costs due to immediate implant breast reconstruction

arm_group.description: Immediate implant breast reconstruction using bovine pericardial patch. n=88
Immediate implant breast reconstruction using TiLOOP® Bra Mesh. n=88

intervention.intervention_name: Bovine Pericardial Patch in Immediate Implant Breast Reconstruction
intervention.description: Patients will receive immediate breast implant reconstruction using Bovine Pericardial Patch

intervention.intervention_name: TiLOOP® Bra Mesh in Immediate Implant Breast Reconstruction
intervention.description: Patients will receive immediate breast implant reconstruction using TiLOOP® Bra Mesh

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients diagnosed with I~II stage breast cancer and Intent to receive NSM or SSM and implant based breast reconstruction
2. Do not smoking in the last 4 weeks or more
3. Mental health patients
4. Signed consent to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Locally advanced stage patients or patients with distal metastasis
2. Patients received thoracic wall radiotherapy or will receive radiotherapy
3. Smoking in the last 4 weeks
4. Anticipated implant volume more than 600cc
5. Patients of pregnancy or lactation
6. Patients received neoadjuvant therapy
